lead_paragraph: The American International Group has closed the deal to sell its foreign unit, the American Life Insurance Company, to MetLife for $16.2 billion in cash and MetLife shares.
snippet: American International Group said Monday that it had closed the deal to sell its foreign insurance unit American Life Insurance Company to MetLife for $16.2 billion in cash and Metlife shares.
abstract: American International Group said Monday that it had closed the deal to sell its foreign insurance unit American Life Insurance Company to MetLife for $16.2 billion in cash and Metlife shares.
